resources.string: To see your step summary please go to app settings and grant the permissions.
Refer to the documentation for details.
To see your step summary please go to app settings and grant all permissions.

Go to Samsung Health app > Settings >
About Samsung Health
Tap on 'Version' 10 times
to unveil 'Developer Mode (new)'
 Set to 'ON'

Go to Samsung Health app > Settings >
About Samsung Health
Tap on 'Version' 10 times
to unveil 'Developer Mode (new)'
 Set to 'ON'
Please finish setting up Samsung Health app.
Please finish setting up Samsung Health app.
